name: Zing
tagline: Send money to Twitter and GitHub profiles
body:
### Installation

1. Download the zip file then unzip it
2. Go to chrome://extensions/
3. Click "load unpacked extension" and select the unzipped folder

### Valid Profiles

You can pay any Twitter or GitHub account that has been connected to a blockchain ID. If there's someone you'd like to pay but there is no payment information available for that user, make sure to tell them to sign up for a blockchain ID (e.g. on [onename.com](https://onename.com)) and then verify their GitHub and Twitter accounts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
